Header.title: Your Partner for Growth and Success
Header.paragraph: Headquartered in South Africa, Urban Proxy is a trusted Level 1 BBBEE-certified supplier, delivering tailored solutions and diverse office essentials. Our mission is to drive growth, foster inclusivity, and provide the tools businesses need to excel in todayâ€™s competitive landscape.

About.paragraph: Founded in 2019 by Ntsako Nkuna and Tebello Marabe, Urban Proxy is a trailblazing entity in South Africa's business landscape As a BBBEE Level 1 Certified organization, we are committed to diversity, inclusivity, and excellence. At Urban Proxy (Pty) Ltd, we're more than just a business; we're agents of change. Empowering individuals, uplifting communities, and driving economic growth are at the heart of our mission.

Services.name: Office supplies
Services.text: A comprehensive range of office supplies, from essential stationery items like pens, paper, andorganizers

Services.name: ICT equipment
Services.text: Such as computers, printers, and networking devices, to ensure a fully equipped workspace.

Services.name: Auxillary office equipment
Services.text: This includes ergonomic furniture,storage solutions and presentation tools to enhance productivity and comfort.

Services.name: ICT Devision
Services.text: Seamlessly procuring hardware and software, to installation, commissioning, and ongoing support, we cover all IT needs. Whether it's setting up networks or supplying essential IT commodities.

Services.name: Hardware Supply
Services.text: END-USER COMPONENTS: DESKTOP, CELLPHONE,TABLETS, CAMERAS, SHARED SYSTEMS: PRINTERS, FAX, SCANNERS, PABX, COMPUTER PERIPHERAL: PROJECTORS, HEADPHONES, COMPUTER, MOUSE, SCREENS, CAMERAS, ETC, LAN CABLING: DATA AND VOICE CABLING (VOIP),LAN INSTALLATION &, UPGRADE, CAT5/4 CABLING, PATCH PANELS,CABINET, SWITCHES, PABX, CONNECTIONS, AND ROUTERS, STORAGE DEVICES:, WIRELESS: WIFI HOTSPOT, CELLULAR APN, PROJECTORS, HEAD PHONES.

Services.name: Software Supply
Services.text: Software licensing and Renewals, Web Development, CRM SYSTEMS, MS OFFICE 365, Order Management, Telephone Management System, Printer Management System, Mobile Application Systems, Mobile Security Systems.

Features.title: Vision
Features.text: To be the foremost catalyst for positive change, innovation, and empowerment, driving sustainable growth and prosperity in South Africa and beyond. We aspire to inspire, transform, and leave a lasting legacy that transcends industries, enriches lives, and shapes a brighter future for generations to come.

Features.title: Mission
Features.text: At Urban Proxy our mission is to empower individuals, businesses, and communities through innovative solutions that drive growth, foster inclusivity, and create lasting impact. By harnessing the collective talents of our team and leveraging cutting-edge technology, we strive to redefine possibilities, inspire excellence, and shape a more equitable and prosperous world.
